data.title: E continuavano a chiamarlo figlio di...
data.text:
El Zorro justiciero (Spain · Italy 1972 / Director: Rafael Romero Marchent)

Synopsis

A falsely accused young man is aided by the masked avenger against an evil land baron.

Credits

Cast (Spanish): Fabio Testi [as Martin Moore] (Don Diego, Zorro), Carlos Romero Marchent (Fred Macaslim), Simonetta Vitelli [as Simoneta Brondell] (Perla Dominguez), Piero Lulli (Buck), Andrés Mejuto (Warner), Eduardo Calvo (judge), Riccardo Garrone (Albert Pison), Luis Induni (sheriff), Antonio Gradoli (Pedro), Emilio Rodriguez (Ian Wanderman), Antonio Almorós (deputy), Miguel de la Riva (Warner henchman), Frank Braña [as Francisco Braña](Dominguez)

Italian credit only: Luis Gaspar

Uncredited actors: Rufino Inglés (banker), Agustín Bescos (auction guest), Ernesto Vañes (Warner henchman)

Story: Rafael Romero Marchent

Screenplay: Rafael Romero Marchent, Nino Stresa

Cinematography: Marcello Masciocchi [Eastmancolor - Techniscope 2,35:1]

Music: Lallo Gori

Set Decoration: Demofilo Fidani

Reviews

Review and retrospective article

June 24, 1972 (Italy)
